articles.title: Astronauts ready for first, all-European mission to the International Space Station – Spaceflight Now - Spaceflight Now
articles.description: The mission will be the sixth trip to the orbiting outpost for Ax-3 Commander Michael López-Alegría and the first for the other three crew members. Launch is planned for Wednesday, Jan. 17, at 5:11
articles.content:
(Left to right) Ax-3 Mission Specialist Marcus Wandt, Pilot Walter Villadei, Commander Michael López-Alegría, Mission Specialist Alper Gezeravc. Image: Axiom Space
For the third time, Axiom Space is… [+5854 chars]
